header: 英语四级词汇语法练习题 第041组

questions.question: As a commander, you should not _______ the soldiers to unnecessary danger.
questions.explanation: 根据句子中的语法，动词“expose”表示“暴露于危险之中”。

questions.question: This newspaper often _______ the government’s opinion, not the public opinion.
questions.explanation: 根据句子意思，这家报纸只是反映政府的意见，并没有影响政府的意见。

questions.question: Although in great danger, the wounded still did not want to _______ from the front.
questions.explanation: 尽管身处险境，伤员仍不愿意从前线撤退。

questions.question: This movie has a _______ ending. You can not imagine who will be killed finally.
questions.explanation: 这部电影的结局很戏剧性。你无法想象谁会最终被杀死。

questions.question: During the graduation _______, the president gave a wonderful opening speech.
questions.explanation: 句子中的“graduation ceremony”表示“毕业典礼”。毕业典礼是一个正式的活动，标志着学业完成。根据句子意思，在毕业典礼上，校长发表了精彩的开幕演讲。因此，选项 D 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: The dog _______ the rabbit but could not catch it.
questions.explanation: 句子中的“chased”表示“追逐”。追逐的意思是“在后面跟着，为了抓住某人或某物”。根据句子意思，狗追逐兔子，但没有抓住它。因此，选项 D 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: If your letter is over weight, you must pay for the _______.
questions.explanation: 句子中的“excess”表示“超额”。超额的意思是“超过规定的数量或程度”。根据句子意思，如果信件超重，则需要支付超重费。因此，选项 A 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: In the class the teacher asked the students to _______ their bad habits.
When you study in the United States, usually you have to buy your own health _______.
Chocolate and ice-crean have different _______.
This is an _______ that will not be easily forgotten.
Please _______ me for my rudeness. I really do not know the custom here.
Water and air are _______ to human beings. We can not live without them.
When the airplane takes off, the passengers are told to _______ their seat belts.
This is not what we asked you to do. You can not get more pay for the _______ work.
My throat is _______. I cannot speak any more.
Many years ago, a lot of factories were _______ from big cities to the mountainous areas in case of war.
He said in his letter that he would _______ some photographs but I couldn’t find anything in the envelope.
Many English words are _______ from Latin.
I feel _______ to say that I can not believe what he said.

header: 英语四级词汇语法练习题 第040组

questions.question:
This year our university does not have any _______ to continue the international student exchange program.
　A.function B.fundamental C.funeral D.

Who is the patient being _______ on?
　A.painted B.operated C.tied D.fetched
Mary is _______ of but I am not. 　A.pause B.adventure C.grammatical D.fond
This man has been proved _______ of murder. 　A.guilty B.spoil C.flash D.curious
The international situation is very _______ in the Middle East.
Even though he knew that I should study, he still ______ me to go to the movies.
We _______ that it will take another four months to finish this plan.
He read the paper several times but be still _______ some printer’s errors.
She often talks with a _______ appearance but in fact she is always telling lies.
If the students can not support themselves during their study in university, they may ask for a student _______ from the government.
English has become a communication _______ for people from different countries.
During the eight years war, many people _______ their blood for their country.
You have greatly _______us. What you have done is not what you told us about several weeks ago.
Before you begin writing your paper, please write ------__________ first. Then we can have a better idea about what you are going to talk about.
If you ask why I plan to study in the United States, the only answer is that it is a _______ for me .
A _______ political and economic situation is very important for the development of any country.
The financial support is decided not only according to your GRE score, but also according to your _______ in college.
The World Trade Center is often called a _______ Building, because it is made up of two identical buildings.
It is impossible for us to _______ such a difficult task within the limited time.
Please do not _______ when somebody else is talking.

header: 英语四级词汇语法练习题 第039组

questions.question: Students with _______ problems may apply for student loans.
Both sugar and salt can ______in water.
I have not heard anything from him since his _______.
Without a proper education, people could _______ all kinds of crimes.
This morning in the class, our teacher lost his _______ at last because he could not stand any more.
It is not ---_______ for me to return all the books to the library now because I still need some of them for my research.
When traveling alone in the mountains, you’d better take a _______ with you in case you get lost.
When traveling alone in the mountains, you’d better take a _______ with you in case you get lost.
As a teacher, you should not _______ the students from asking questions in class.
This kind of medicine has the power to _______poison.
Before you mail this letter, you should check again whether you have _______ it or not.
After talking for nearly ten hours, he _______ to the government’s pressure at last.
My hands and feet were ________ with cold as I waited for the bus.
This problem is beyond his ability and he can not ________ it.
When you buy the spare parts for your car, try to get the _______ ones from the authorized dealer.
If you use _______, you can get a higher quality picture.
Who _______ this country, the people or the president? This question is not easy to answer.

questions.question: The doctors _______ the medicines to the people in the flood area.
Much of the news provided by this newspaper is _______, not foreign.

　A.  B. C. D.
Many kinds of animals are believed to have _________ from the earth

Pine trees are usually believed to _______ cold weather.

After working for twenty hours , the doctors were _______.
The college students in China are _______ from smoking on campus because this will do them no good.
Professor Smith is also the _______ of the international program office. If you have any problem when you study here, you may go to him for help.
We won’t allow any foreign country to _______ in our internal affairs.
We can not _______ all the magazines together.
What he said in the meeting _______ everybody present.
Some lazy men would rather _______ than work.
This boy was _______ for what he had done in the class.
Some states in the United States _______ people to carry guns.
Carelessness made him fall in his job _______.
Sometimes it is very difficult to _______ some of the English words. Even the native speaker can not help.

questions.question: With the _______of Mary, all the girl students are eager to go to the party.

When a spacecraft travels, one of the major problems is reentry into the Earth’s _______.
　A.  B. C. D.
This river forms a natural _______ between China and Korea.

questions.question: ___ your opinions are worth considering, the committee finds it unwise to place too much importance on them.

questions.question: Living in the western part of the country has its problems, ___ obtaining fresh water is not the least.

___ he's already heard the news.

esides being expensive, the food tastes ___ .

questions.question: "Does anybody want an extra ticket to go to the movies?" "Who would you rather ___ with you, George or me;
